mql1.query: fetch cloud_dataproc_cluster | metric 'dataproc.googleapis.com/cluster/yarn/nodemanagers' | filter (metric.status == 'unhealthy') | group_by 1m, [value_nodemanagers_mean: mean(value.nodemanagers)] | every 1m | group_by [], [value_nodemanagers_mean_max: max(value_nodemanagers_mean)] | graph_period 2s
